mapper.insert: insert into Board( title, email, content, group_No,file_Name,file_Size,original_File_Name,sort_No,downCount,step,price,account_no) values( #{title},#{email}, #{content}, #{groupNo},#{fileName},#{fileSize},#{originalFileName},#{sortNo},#{downCount},${step},#{price},#{accountNo})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select * from board where group_no=#{kind} order by board_no desc )A )
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: select pwd from board where no=#{no}

select * from ( select * from board order by no desc )
where rownum<=6
